entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Enable EVEX embedded broadcasting support in xarch emitter #80825
  • Light up `Span` with `Vector512` code paths. #80824
  • Add opmask (k) registers to the register allocator #80823
  • Add EVEX encoding opmask (k) register masking to xarch emitter #80821
  • Implement light-weight K register `ExtractMostSignificantBits` for `Vector512` #80820
  • NegotiateStream Wireshark decoder #80818
  • System.Text.Json: The type 'System.String&' may not be used as a type argument. #80816
  • Implement `Vector<T>` API surface for `Vector512` hardware acceleration #80814
  • [API Proposal]: `SignatureTypeEncoder.TypedReference()` #80812
  • Implement minimal `Vector512` hardware accelerated lowering in the JIT #80811
  • Enable 512-bit SIMD types in .NET Runtime and JIT #80810
  • JIT: `optInvertLoops` depends on bbNum ordering but doesn't guarantee it #80809
    8.0.0
  • [tracking] Webcil follow-up work #80807
    8.0.0
  • Linux-arm64 Mono LLVM FullAOT leg frequently times out #80805
    8.0.0
  • HttpWebRequest.GetResponse uses ThreadPool thread in execution path and blocks this thread in case of non-responding server #80801
  • URI.TryCreate Does not correctly parse mailto protocol multiple to addresses #80799
  • [Tracking] Mono support for InlineArrayAttribute #80798
    8.0.0
  • ResourceManager not threadsafe when case insensitive keys are used #80790
    Future
  • [mono] Add arm64/neon opcode macros to the codegen #80788
    8.0.0
  • Enable wasi tests #80787
    8.0.0
  • Create experimental wasi-wasm runtime pack workloads #80786
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] Update emsdk to latest #80784
    8.0.0
  • Would for some tests system wide profiling be a good thing? #80783
  • The token supplied to the function is invalid at System.Net.NTAuthentication.GetOutgoingBlob #80781
  • Distributed Transaction error/issue with .NET 7 #80777
  • Distributed Transaction .Net 7 - Lost process #80776
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeUsesFloatReg(targetType) || (emitTypeSize(targetType) == emitTypeSize(op1Type))' #80773
    8.0.0
  • Test failure tracing/runtimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource/nativeruntimeeventsource.sh #80767
    8.0.0
  • Intrinsify RuntimeHelpers.CreateSpan on Mono #80762
    8.0.0
  • `IListProvider<T>.ToList()` implementations use `list.Add(element)` instead of direct array initialization. #80760
    Future

Closed

  • How to build CoreCLR on windows arm64ec using MSVC #80774
  • System.Text.Json: Make the Utf8JsonWriter always insert newlines between the end of comments and the start of arrays or objects #52408
    Future
  • System.Diagnostics.Process.OutputDataReceived - determine final newline #78565
  • Loop opts should not be recomputing pred lists from scratch #49030
    8.0.0
  • Assertion failed 'block->countOfInEdges() > 0' #80772
    8.0.0
  • Blazor Debugging on Firefox #80043
    8.0.0
  • Field assignment perf regression in 7.0-rc2 #77346
  • Interop Source Generator TFM check is very expensive #80621
    8.0.0
  • Mono C# low-level struct feature support #48113
    8.0.0
  • Mono terminates Program when calling Console.WriteLine from C++ #80803
  • Add support for host startup hooks to Mono #47462
    8.0.0
  • Filehandle Blocks "Cut and Paste" allows "Copy and Paste" #79213
  • IEnumerable<T>.All() should return false for empty collections #80793
  • Annotate unsupported APIs in System.Net.Security #57097
    8.0.0
  • Regression: "The path must be absolute." on Debian Linux #80710
  • Manually resolving `JsonTypeInfo` + `Serialize methods` slower than call `Serializer` directly #80750
  • Test failure tracing/eventpipe/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror/eventsourceerror.sh #80679
  • PeriodicTimer.WaitForNextTickAsync should not throw OperationCanceledException #80778
  • Use modern-themed buttons in the host error message box. #71288
    8.0.0
  • Test failure tracing\\eventpipe\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport\\diagnosticport.cmd #80680
    8.0.0
  • [wasm] timeout in System.Runtime.Tests #76110
    7.0.x
  • Segfault on attempt to call a Profiler API method on Linux #80617
    8.0.0
  • Process.WaitForExit() deadlock when running multiple processes on linux with .net7 #80563
  • JIT: local morph ref counting does not handle GT_JMP #80731
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\Runtime_64208\\Runtime_64208\\Runtime_64208.cmd` #80588
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `Loader\\classloader\\StaticVirtualMethods\\NegativeTestCases\\CuriouslyRecurringGenericWithUnimplementedMethod\\CuriouslyRecurringGenericWithUnimplementedMethod.cmd` #80587
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `Loader\\CollectibleAssemblies\\ByRefLocals\\ByRefLocals\\ByRefLocals.cmd` #80586
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `Regressions\\coreclr\\GitHub_16833\\Test16833\\Test16833.cmd` #80585
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `JIT\\Regression\\JitBlue\\DevDiv_461649\\DevDiv_461649\\DevDiv_461649.cmd` #80584
    8.0.0
  • Possible ARM64 GC Hole - `JIT/HardwareIntrinsics/General/Vector256_1/Vector256_1_ro/Vector256_1_ro` #80582
    8.0.0
  • Test failure ilasm\\PortablePdb\\IlasmPortablePdbTests\\IlasmPortablePdbTests.cmd #79431
    8.0.0
  • Exception occurs during string interpolation #80685
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: [File/Directory]Info.RemoveSymbolicLink() #80771
  • ilconformance test for stind.ref doesn't test stind.ref #78867
    8.0.0
  • IWA authentication on Android fails with TypeInitializationException in NetSecurityNative #77015

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix dynamic class zeroing #80822
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Raw ECDiffieHellman key agreement #80819
    NO-REVIEW, area-System.Security, new-api-needs-documentation
  • NativeAOT: Don't check time budget in inliner when --Ot is set #80817
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Improve StringComparer.OrdinalIgnoreCase.Compare perf #80813
  • [wasm] Use newer ubuntu 20.04 images #80808
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Fix mess with precode macro definitions #80806
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Support Unicode 15 #80804
    area-System.Globalization, 8.0.0
  • [iOS] Change test exclusion path for System.Reflection.Emit tests #80800
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Enable SIMD #80797
    area-Build-mono
  • [IGNORE][wasm] perf - debugging #80796
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-coreclr, perf-pipeline
  • [mono][interp] Properly initialize fields of LocalValue #80795
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Fix TargetOS value `linux` instead of `Unix` #80794
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Disable DnsGetHostAddresses_PostCancelledToken_Throws #80792
    area-System.Net
  • Ensure various scalar cross platform helper APIs are handled directly as intrinsic #80789
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/6.0] Close MsQuic after checking for QUIC support to free resources #80785
    area-System.Net.Quic
  • [JIT] More bool optimizations #80765
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use runtime ILLink.Tasks package instead of dotnet/linker #80764
    NO-MERGE, area-Tools-ILLink, 8.0.0
  • LambdaExpression.CanCompileToIL should respect IsDynamicCodeSupported #80759
    area-System.Linq.Expressions

Merged

  • Refine json comment position for Utf8JsonWriter; Make WriteCommentValue() overloads have same behavior #75074
    area-System.Text.Json, community-contribution
  • Add missing license header #80802
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: fix remaining phases that were rebuilding pred edges #80769
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm][debug]Press alt-shift-d and open firefox debug tab attached to the blazor app #80722
    area-Debugger-mono
  • Switch to using the .NET SDK properties that are defined to provide the TFM instead of using the assembly that defines System.Object #80646
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, tenet-performance, source-generator
  • Implement Startup hooks support in Mono #80391
    area-VM-meta-mono
  • JIT: Streamline TreeLifeUpdater #80611
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • SPMI: Update -metrics passthrough #80775
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Add AVX2 support to IndexOfAnyValues #78863
    area-System.Memory, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • Fix recent IndexOf regressions #80779
    area-System.Memory, 8.0.0
  • add unsupported attributes to System.Net.Security #80717
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.0
  • Partial revert of #71486 to unblock dotnet/sdk #80791
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Use TaskDialog for error dialog in Windows GUI apps #78087
    area-Host
  • Fix diagnosticport test failure in ilasm/ildasm round-trip testing #80766
    test-bug, area-Diagnostics-coreclr
  • [mono][interp] Add 16 byte default alignment to interp frames #80700
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • [mono][aot] Optimize the layout of the extra_method_table. #80682
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix use of span local in WebSocketHandle.ConnectAsync #80770
    area-System.Net
  • [wasm] Enable dedup by default. #80260
    area-Build-mono
  • JIT: Add a stress mode that poisons implicit byrefs #80691
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Account for GT_JMP implicit uses in local morph ref counting #80734
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • JIT: Fix GC hole for Armv8.1 Atomics #80740
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [wasm] WBT: Add `submit-wbt-helix` make target #80763
    area-Build-mono
  • Set AssemblyName.ProcessorArchitecture for compatibility. #80581
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Updating stind_ref.il test to actually use stind_ref #80761
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Default to ILC host architecture that matches OS architecture on Windows #80752
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • JIT: maintain pred lists during loop unrolling #80625
    area-CodeGen-coreclr

Updated

  • [Android] Add NetworkChange implementation using PeriodicTimer #80548
    area-System.Net, os-android
  • Add System.Text.CompositeFormat #80753
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Change the default loop unroll limit to 4 #80353
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Draft] Test merging IL_Conformance #80597
    area-System.Reflection.Metadata
  • Enable AVX512 Additional 16 SIMD Registers #79544
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • Initial work to port EventPipe library to NativeAOT #80382
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [JIT] X64 - Extend emitter peephole optimization of eliminating unnecessary `mov` instructions #79381
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Vectorize Enumerable.Range(...).ToArray() #80633
    area-System.Linq, community-contribution
  • [wasm][icu] ICU files sharding + custom icu data loading for WASM #80421
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [wasm][debugger] Implement support to symbolOptions from dap. #79284
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [tests] Stand up iOS arm runtime tests and enable tracing/eventpipe tests #79169
    area-Infrastructure-mono, runtime-mono
  • NativeAOT: avoid helper calls for static fields #79709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [mono][wasm] Bundle assemblies as WebCIL #79416
    arch-wasm, area-AssemblyLoader-mono
  • Implement DivRem intrinsic for X86 #66551
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Replace successive "ldr" and "str" instructions with "ldp" and "stp" #77540
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address Sanitizer support in CoreCLR #74623
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, tenet-reliability, area-Infrastructure
  • Remove the second type parameter from CastingConverter #80755
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Final removal of uses of Windows wide char printing #80758
    area-PAL-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • [browser][http] Fix blocking of streaming response and abort #80693
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Prefix exported symbols defined via EntryPoint of UnmanagedCallersOnl… #79880
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [JIT] Support `x % {pow2_cns}` transformation for `ulong` types #79676
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Implement new `ComWrappers` APIs #80402
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Use SetupProperties to set properties related to NativeAOT and remove the top-level defaults #79233
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [browser] improve default initial memory size #80507
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Ensure call offset is greater than offset of other active calls #80728
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono, 8.0.0
  • Avoid unobserved ReadAheadTask exceptions in HttpConnection #80214
    area-System.Net.Http, 8.0.0
  • Support use of fast-path serialization in combined JsonSerializerContexts. #80741
    area-System.Text.Json, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • NativeAOT for FreeBSD #80323
    NO-MERGE, blocked, os-freebsd, community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [mono][aot] Emit only virtual methods of instances when a class insta… #80267
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • [release/6.0] Allow retaining the original casing for known header values #80754
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • [release/7.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80553
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 7.0.x
  • [release/6.0] Enforce HttpClient limits on GetFromJsonAsync #80552
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Net.Http, 6.0.x
  • Make TypeComponentsCache trimmable #80726
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm] optional legacy JS interop #79622
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • [mono] Introduce designated direct pinvokes to mono aot compiler #79721
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Suppress warnings for taking address of TypedReference #80484
    area-System.Runtime.CompilerServices
  • Strip all symbols on macOS as well #80515
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add MemoryExtensions.Count #80662
    area-System.Memory, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [wasm] Conditionally disable `--allow-undefined` #80495
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • Fix nested non-byref like VC with no pointer fields #80642
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-18
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: Merge up to but not including PR67238 #2175

Merged

  • [NativeAOT-LLVM] Remove unnecessary symbol indirections #2173

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • .NET 8 Workloads Tracking Epic #30008
    8.0.1xx
  • ConfigurationBinder.Get<T> ignores value types .ctor #30005

Closed

  • SDK 3.1 builds C#9 code in a way leading to bugs #20119
  • Blazor WebAssembly AOT workload does not install on Windows 11 ARM64 #19126
    7.0.2xx
  • Adding project to solution results in InvalidOperationException #28155
    7.0.2xx
  • Re-enable C++/CLI tests #11008
    7.0.2xx
  • dotnet publish fails with MSB4062 RequiresFramework35SP1Assembly could not be loaded #29951
  • [NETSDKE2E][Regression]With .Net 8 SDK installed, publish blazorwasm project failed with error "error NETSDK1144: Optimizing assemblies for size failed..." #29792

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #30013
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #30012
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2091801 #30009
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #30006
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #29990
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Find out where the nupkgs and nuget.config files are on a normal build #29985
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use better AOT defaults in Web SDK #29984
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Do not eagerly discover CWD during parser construction #28836
    Area-CLI, cli-ux, 7.0.2xx
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2089789 #29964
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #30007
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'release/6.0.4xx' #29976
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #29991
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'release/7.0.3xx' #29989
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for conversion operator generation, extension methods and methods with variable number of arguments. #30001
    Area-GenAPI
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #29988
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Try not building the test assets and see what happens #29376
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add support for EnableRequestDelegateGenerator flag #29982
    Area-AspNetCore
  • Use UTF-8 Encoding by Default On Windows On Non English Languages #29755
    Area-Infrastructure
  • dotnet tool install skip unlisted version #28951
  • Make `dotnet publish` use `Release` by default in 8.0+ Projects #29155
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Add a PostAction to support modifying Json files in CLI templates #29880
    Area-dotnet new
  • Update NetAnalyzers version for release/7.0.1xx #29463
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Use Runtime ILLink package on SDK #29983
    Area-ILLink, DO NOT MERGE

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Updated

  • Require await to apply nullable postconditions to task-returning calls #6888
  • Expand lambdas and method body definitions to allow any block like statements #6887

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix documentation-comment.md urls #6856

Updated

  • Add roles spec covering static extensions #6880

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • EditorConfig UI stays empty #66474
  • Document Outline VS2022 17.4 show "hard to watch" tree node when member's class are inline #66473
  • Explicit type preference is missing in code cleanup in 17.4.0 preview 3 #66472
  • analyzers projects should have `IsAnalyzer` property set to true #66471
  • ForAttributeWithMetadataName in IIncrementalGenerator failing with ArgumentException #66451

Closed

  • Support Go to Definition in Object Browser for imported assemblies #36120
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-33318.109 #66470
  • Obsolete attribute with interpolated message doesn't produce diagnostics #66465
  • Unable to call a local function from intermidiate window during debugging #66463
  • [Bug] Explicit layout with record struct #66373

PullRequests

Created

  • Inline diagnostics - fix multiple blank lines bug #66468
    Area-IDE
  • Reduce NamingStylePreferences allocations for Default and Empty #66467
    Area-IDE
  • Avoid capturing allocation in GetOrCreateDescriptor #66466
    Area-Analyzers
  • Use `SyntaxReference` instead of `SyntaxNode` in `EmitContext` #66464
    Area-Compilers
  • Obsolete `ISourceGenerator` APIs #66462
    Area-Compilers
  • Create closed Razor file integration test #66459
    Area-IDE
  • Gracefully handle negative endLine and endColumn values for build errors #66458
    Area-IDE
  • Update Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Analyzers to 3.3.4 #66456
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66454
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts
  • Add workaround for web-tools added design time documents #66453
    Area-IDE
  • Fix doc comment on ForAttributeWithMetadataName #66452
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix stepping UI delays #66450
    Area-Interactive
  • Merge release/dev17.5-vs-deps to main #66449
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Merge Conflicts

Merged

  • Support Go To Definition in Object Browser for metadata references #66026
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.5 to release/dev17.5-vs-deps #66455
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Enable EnC file logging during VS Feedback recording and collect the logs #66443
    Area-Interactive, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to release/dev17.5 #66031
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Needs API Review
  • Optimize StringBuilder calculations for netcoreapp3.1 and newer #66156
    Area-Compilers, Next
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2088372 #66423
  • Temporarily stop merging in main-vs-deps #66366
    Area-Infrastructure, Next

Updated

  • Revert "Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2088372" #66477
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2087177" #66476
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Treat `TypedReference` as managed #66328
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Move some severity configurations to globalconfig #65274
    Area-Infrastructure, Community
  • Ensure no extension method applies to System.Void #66416
    Area-Compilers
  • Preserve changes that are still relevant after revert of #66311 #66440
    Area-Compilers
  • Use dictionary lookup while resolving assembly references #66430
    Area-Compilers
  • Length-based switch dispatch #66081
    Area-Compilers, 17.6
  • Ensure event handler generation and navigation in webforms works properly #66394
    Area-IDE
  • Allow directories in source generator outputs #66438
    Area-Compilers
  • Visit unreachable `when` clauses by `NullableWalker` #66405
  • Implemented `Make field/property required` codefix #66233
    Area-IDE, Community
  • EditorConfig comments cannot follow a property value #51625
    Area-Compilers, New Feature - Editor Config
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2091149 #66287
  • Solution services cleanup #64160
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Is IAsyncEnumerable supported as a client result type in SignalR? #46161
  • Blazor webassembly not reloading #46159
  • `ResponseCookies.Delete(key)` not deleting when website is not in root path #46158
  • Obsolete IPNetwork #46157
    .NET 8 Planning
  • dotnet publish --no-build with separate build #46156
  • RegexRouteConstraint should use Compiled Regex #46154
  • Blazor WASM deployed to Cloudfront on url downloads 70 dlls, but Cloudfront url only downloads 20 #46152
  • FileStreamResultExecutor does not write Content-Length, also when Length is known #46149
  • MacOS/BlazorServer/HTTPS/.NET7.0: Protocol unsupported, no secure connection, ERR_SSL_VERSION_OR_CIPHER_MISMATCH after changes #46146
  • Best way for project with multiple client applications #46145
  • error #46153
  • Unusual environment behaviour/selection with dotnet watch in parent folder #46144
  • Remove JsonSerializerOptions copy in `ProblemDetailsJsonOptionsSetup` #46143
  • Resolve routing RegEx constraint dependency size issue #46142
    .NET 8 Planning

Closed

  • Bind CascadingParameter multiple times in same component #46147
  • UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute should respect [SkipStatusCodePages] #39472
    8.0-preview1
  • [Kestrel] Count all traffic per request, including headers #46118
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, updates #46155
  • Perf improvement: mapaction #46138
  • Perf improvement: plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #46133
  • Perf improvement: stage1publishaot #46090
  • Perf improvement: stage1publishaot #45936
  • Perf regression: fortunes_gin, json_actix #45634
  • Perf improvement: plaintext_express #45633
  • Perf improvement: json_actix, plaintext_express #45601
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mapaction #45433
  • Perf regression: connectionclosehttps, json_actix, plaintext_nodejs #45414
  • EmbeddedFileProvider: Not recognizing correct manifest resource names #45585
    Backlog
  • Perf regression: json_nodejs, plaintext, plaintext, plaintext_nodejs #45348
  • Perf regression: caching, connectionclose #45304
  • Perf improvement: mapaction, mapaction, plaintext_actix, plainTextSansFilter #45303
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries #45301
  • Perf improvement: json, mapaction #45019
  • Perf improvement: multiple_queries, updates, updates #44874
  • Blazor Hot Reload generic #46100
  • Add interfaces for Identity classes (UserManager<>, SignInManager<>) #45895

PullRequests

Created

  • Add token to Dependabot config #46160
    area-infrastructure
  • Removed SurveyPrompt from blazor server and blazor wasm project templates #46150
    area-mvc

Merged

  • Support SkipStatusCodePages when not using WebApplication builder and UseStatusCodePagesWithReExecute #46109
    area-runtime, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • Wrong replication of resource names in embedded file provider #46067
    area-mvc, community-contribution, 8.0-preview1
  • [main] (deps): Bump src/submodules/googletest from `9345421` to `356fc30` #46121

Updated

  • Fix Blazor PageContext disposal #46097
    area-blazor
  • Allow minimal host to be created without default HostBuilder behavior #46040
    area-runtime
  • Making `JsonOptions` AOT/Trimmer-safe with EnsureJsonTrimmability switch #45886
  • string.Split to Span.Split #46098
    Perf
  • Update DeflateDecompressionProvider to use ZLibStream instead of DeflateStream #45836
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Implement request timeout middleware #46115
    area-runtime, community-contribution
  • Enable setting ServerTimeout and KeepAliveInterval in HubConnectionBuilder #46065
    area-signalr
  • Run Selenium tests on Playwright via an adapter [experiment] #45284
    area-mvc
  • Add section to UpdatingMajorVersionAndTFM.md about marking APIs shipped #46088
    area-infrastructure
  • [blazor][wasm][debug]Press alt-shift-d and open firefox debug tab attached to the blazor app #46132
    area-blazor
  • consider escaped commas in LDAP distinguished name #45649
    area-security, community-contribution
  • [AOT] Enable analysis and annotate Http.Results #46082
    area-web-frameworks
  • Try OSX 13 again #45855
    area-infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2083484 #45630
    area-mvc, * NO MERGE *
  • Don't check in blazor.*.js files #45883
    area-blazor
  • Move Kestrel shared source test attributes to src\Shared #46112
    area-runtime, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • New Maui projects should only open the Overview Page in VS #12755
  • WebView Right Click & Navigation requested notification #12751
  • Picker and Switch BackgroundColor properties are not updated from ViewModel #12749
  • RelativeLayout crashes android app. #12748
    Backlog
  • Shell Navigation not works properly #12740
    Backlog
  • Error when using DisplayAlert in override void onAppearing #12739
    Backlog
  • WebView clears all other control elements rendered before it into blank #12734
    Backlog
  • FontImageSource Glyph using font name #12732
    Backlog
  • TodoREST Sample Project “HttpRequestException: The Internet connection appears to be offline.” “Local network prohibited” on iOS 16 #12731
  • Windows Application Package build error Microsoft.DesktopBridge.targets(744,5): error : Specified EntryPointExe '' was not found in the project outputs. #12729

Closed

  • Entry Control Not Rendering Properly On Android #9251
    Backlog
  • Shell TitleView disappearing on tab change #9687
    Backlog
  • Shell Title not changing as expected #9842
    Backlog
  • Title view not displayed after navigating shell tabs #9269
    .NET 7 Planning
  • iOS Navigation / Back Button has page title of current page not previous page; slow/delayed to change navigation page #11691
    Backlog
  • [iOS] Title is bugged during and after page transition #10945
    Backlog
  • [Android]camera permission is not enabled on launching the maui app #12711
  • Move the splash image generation out of the main image generation task #10811
  • VerticalScrollbar not showing when scrollview is added to the child of contentview #12547
    Backlog
  • TapGestureRecognizer not working on a Frame in a grid on iOS or Mac #8330
  • ResourceDictionary Source-Property not settable #12709
    Backlog
  • Image width are not properly applied based on its parents size #8851

PullRequests

Created

  • Prevent mobile and lib templates from opening editors if in VS #12756
    community ✨
  • Ensure flyout detail updated if not initial page push on navigation #12754
    community ✨
  • Use relative X position of tap when determining if the button was hit #12753
  • [net7.0] Update to 6.0 SR10 version #12752
  • Retain the cursor position when transforming the text #12750
  • Merge main into net8 #12744
  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.PublicApiAnalyzers from 3.3.3 to 3.3.4 #12742
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget

Merged

  • Bump Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.BannedApiAnalyzers from 3.3.3 to 3.3.4 #12741
    area/upstream, dependencies, nuget
  • Stable 6.0.5xx-sr10 versioning #12746
  • Don't explicitly copy to the build server #12747
  • [net7.0] Initial code for replacing the deployment manager #12745
  • Generate everything splash related in the splash target #12481
    area/single project ☝️
  • Fix timing on iOS Toolbar #12363
    area/shell 🐢, area/toolbar
  • Update sdk-insertion-bump.yml #12738
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Merge main into net8 #12715
  • Initial code for replacing the deployment manager #12730
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Attach the gestures to the correct (container or platform) view #12108
    area/Xaml </>
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #12679
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • Flag valid measure status in iOS backing views to avoid repeat measuring #12627
  • Fix typo in repro.md. #12736
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Fix BlazorWebView WinForms deadlock when disposing #12656
  • Make MAUI into 1 workload and lots of NuGets instead of a full workload #11206
    area/setup 🪄
  • Make inline video / picture in picture enabled by default on WebView for iOS #11075
    platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-webview
  • Connect gestures LifeCycle to Container and Window #12259
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • Ensure iOS always has the required splash storyboard #12677
  • [iOS] Fix Border Content clipping issues #10964
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎
  • Internalize MessagingCenter #12582
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Android] Fix clipped text in SwipeItem under some DPIs #11931
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-swipeview
  • Update SemanticScreenReader API Docs #12724

  • Resolve some life cycle issues with `TabbedPage` when nested inside a `NavigationPage` #11530

  • Fix gestures in Label Spans #12027
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-label, area/gestures
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [iOS/Catalyst] Correctly render ContentPage brushes background #11721
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-pages
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Android] Fix shadows size in clipped views #11603

  • fix issue 9255 (Wrong Date format DatePicker Windows) #11073

  • reduce duplicate IndexOf calls #12599

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Circular dependency was detected in the data to be saved #30093
  • Dynamic tables in entity framework #30092
  • add-migration and Update-database don`t work on VS Community 2022 Preview(1.7.5.0 Preview 2.0) #30090
  • Add-Migration is not useful #30089
  • Migration missing on Linux, but not on Windows. #30088
  • Insert fails when model has tables with same name in different schemas #30087

Closed

  • Adding Migration changes namespace and classname #30091
  • Unable to load mod_spatialite extension into sqlite connection on .NET 7 #30051
  • dbcontext optimize command omits certain characters from namespaces #30045
  • SQL output can contain navigation properties as columns - EF Core 7 #30029
  • InMemory database throwing ArgumentException when using value-converted property in a query #30026
  • KeyNotFoundException on nullable nested object in JSON column if that object does not exist. #30062
  • Is there support for migrations from TPH/TPT to TPC planned? #30083

PullRequests

Created

  • [SMALL] Fix to #30073 - JSON query regression in EF8 #30086

Merged

  • Move taking of lock earlier to avoid race in PruneCallback #30080
  • Allow field navigations in proxies when lazy-loading is disabled for the navigation #30082

Updated

  • Provide more information when exception thrown discovering/creating design-time DbContexts #30070
  • Clarify how the --table and --schema parameters work when scaffolding #30071
  • Remove regex from SqlServerMigrationsSqlGenerator #30069
  • Allow opting out of RETURNING/OUTPUT clauses in SaveChanges #29917

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-01-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • [NETE2ESDK]VS version on .NET 8 SDK installation wizard need to be updated with each release. #15294

Closed

  • [NETE2ESDK] With .NET 8.0 SDK pkg installed on MAC, showing a redundant .NET Runtime #15003
  • The installer cache will not be deleted automatically, taking up a lot of disk space #15266
  • Not Supported #15287

PullRequests

Created

  • Pin the emsdk and mono workloads so that the baseline manifest doesn't update each month #15303
  • remove unnecessary nowarn from source-build SBRP project #15302
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.3xx' => 'main' #15300
  • Scan the VMR for binaries and cloaked files #15299

Merged

  • Update the table to includ 7.0.3xx #15293
  • Use PAT variable group for internal VMR builds #15291
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.2xx' => 'main' #15278
  • Update implicit versions for Jan release #15276
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'release/7.0.2xx' #15292

Updated

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #15279
  • Enable SHA1 signing for CentOS Stream 9 #15289
  • Add Codespaces for source build investigations #15285
  • Remove source-build manipulation of stable version. #15121
    Area-SourceBuild
  • add tests for covering adding item templates (C# and VB) #15286
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add CI for building with N-1 source-built SDK #15164
    Area-SourceBuild
